Initially, Britain h__ supported t__ anti-communist fact____ in th___ countries, but d__ to i__ dire econ____ condition i_ decided t_ pull o__ and i_ February 1947 requested t__ US t_ continue i__ efforts. data.fullContent: The first substantial aid went to Greece and Turkey in January 1947, which were seen as the front line of the battle against communist expansion, and were already receiving aid under the Truman Doctrine. Initially, Britain had supported the anti-communist factions in those countries, but due to its dire economic condition it decided to pull out and in February 1947 requested the US to continue its efforts. The ECA formally began operation in July 1948.
data.answer: 1947年1月，希腊和土耳其获得了第一批实质性援助，这两个国家被视为抗击共产主义扩张的前线，在杜鲁门主义的指导下已经接受了援助。起初，英国支持这些国家的反共派系，但由于其可怕的经济条件，它决定退出，并在1947年2月请求美国继续努力。1948年7月，非洲经委会正式开始运作。
